import React, { useRef } from 'react' import {Form, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext' export default function Signup(){ const emailRef = useRef(); const passwordRef = useRef(); const passwordConfirmRef = useRef(); const { singup } = useAuth() function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() singup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return(

Sign Up

Email Password Password Confirmation
); }
